body_html: What makes me wonder is that my generator worked in a previous configuration and the error originates from tf.contrib.seq2seq.TrainingHelper which is a common class for seq2seq training. The only thing I believe I have changed is switching from tf1.4 to tf1.5 nightly
body_text: What makes me wonder is that my generator worked in a previous configuration and the error originates from tf.contrib.seq2seq.TrainingHelper which is a common class for seq2seq training. The only thing I believe I have changed is switching from tf1.4 to tf1.5 nightly
body: What makes me wonder is that my generator worked in a previous configuration and the error originates from `tf.contrib.seq2seq.TrainingHelper` which is a common class for seq2seq training. The only thing I believe I have changed is switching from tf1.4 to tf1.5 nightly
